subject: Implementation of Special Concession to Central Government employees working in Kashmir Valley as per DoPT Office Memorandum dated 14.10.2020 & 12.09.2022-reg.
text: HRa <44 RTHRfgifetarut (Ted qRdev &r TTHrf #IrT4, HRT TRGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) #n TR 4-5 Qf 6, Heer-10, E1W, 78 forht 110 075 0 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM4/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Facilities/ 2023 Policy Circular No.1.2.6.2/ 2023 dated June, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No.11041 /SpecialConcession/2023-AdmnllI (Comp. No. 207626)} Sub: Implementation of  Special Concession to Central Government employees working in Kashmir Valley as per DoPT Office Memorandum dated 14.10.2020 & 12.09.2022-reg: Consequent upon the approval of the Competent Authority and in continuation to the Policy Circular No.1.2.6.1/2020 dated 21.01.2020 (copy enclosed), it has been decided to adopt the Department of Personnel and Training Office Memorandum No.18016/3/2018 Estt: (L) dated 14.10.2020 and A-24011/22/2022-Estt, (Leave) dated 12.09.2022 (copies enclosed) related to extension of special concessions/ facilities to Central Government employees working in Kashmir Valley to the officers & employees of NHAI. It has also been decided that, as and when, any modification/ extension is made to the ibid OM dated 12.09.2022 in future the same shall be mutatis mutandis applicable to the officers & employees of NHAI also_ 2. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above 08 23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3 Web Admin for circulation.
